channel.title: Fight Pits Bug
channel.description:
Ok in my server i can't attack people in fight pits minigame cause of "challenge" cause in my source there a duel arena system or whatever you want to name it and if i click "challenge" it dont do anything.
Base: Delta (EvolutionX) Doeb: 317
Here a picture to show you.. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1zwbtb5.jpg[/img]

item.title: Fight Pits Bug
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“blitz ags, post:11, topic:340500”]client.java:763: cannot find symbol symbol : method inFightPits() location: class client if(isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) || isInDuel() || inFightPits()) { ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue...[/quote]
Replace it with whatever method it’s actually called. ‘isInPits’, ‘isInFightPits’, etc?

You’re checking if the player isn’t in a duel, then send the “Challenge” String to the client.

item.title: Fight Pits Bug
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

public void rightClickCheck() { if(!isInDuel()) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(2); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("Challenge"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } if(isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) || isInDuel() || inFightPits()) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); // command slot outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } else { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); // command slot outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("null"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } }

Should work now?

Read full topic

item.title: Fight Pits Bug

@blitz_ags wrote:

That???

public void rightClickCheck() { if(!isInDuel()) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(2); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("Challenge"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } if(isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) || isInDuel()) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); // command slot outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } else { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); // command slot outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("null"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } }

item.title: Fight Pits Bug
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

[code]public boolean isInDuelArena(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
if ((coordY >= 3279) && (coordY <= 3279) && (coordX <= 3355) && (coordX >= 3379)) {
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(2);
outStream.writeByteA(0);
outStream.writeString(“Challenge”);
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
return true;
} else {

	outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
	outStream.writeByteC(2);
	outStream.writeByteA(0);
	outStream.writeString("null");
	outStream.endFrameVarSize();
			return true;
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
